## Review {.smaller} - `R` universe - Quarto documents ## Plan for Today ## Getting Lab Material {.smaller} - Open `r4da-labs.Rproj` file to open the *labs* project. - Go into *Git* pane. - If there are any files you changed, you will see them in the window. - Select all these files. - Click on *Commit*, write a commit message, and save it. - If you click on *Push*, it will give you a `git` error message - Click on *Pull* to get the new files uploaded. ![](images/github-pull-success.png) ## Wrap Up
